feature_tribal_2: Design inspired by the iconic Gibson Les Paul.
feature_tribal_4: Premium materials and Black Tribal finish.
feature_tribal_5: Includes adjustable strap and exclusive stickers.
tribal_spec_1: Multi-platform compatibility: Compatible with PC, PC portables, Nintendo Switch 1|2, Android devices, including Smart TVs, tablets, mobile devices, and cloud streaming services like Xbox Cloud Gaming and Luna.
tribal_spec_2: KEYJAM Mode: (Mode 9) transforms the guitar controller into a keyboard and mouse, enabling seamless compatibility with Fortnite Festival on PC, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5. Powered by CRKD's KEYJAM Mapping feature, fret buttons, strum bar, and other inputs are mapped to keyboard controls, while the right joystick functions as a mouse for intuitive menu navigation. KEYJAM mode offers a smooth, plug-and-play experience, making everything from song selection to rocking out smooth, fast, and effortless.
tribal_spec_3: Classic feel: The black tribal guitar controller is equipped with standard fret buttons and a mechanical strum bar for the classic rhythm gaming experience. It offers a familiar and reliable gameplay for all your favorite rhythm games, plus dynamic RGB lighting and customizable features via the CRKD companion app.
tribal_spec_4: Modular design: The modular design allows you to swap out your neck to match your perfect feel. Upgrade to a neck with mechanical frets or, if you prefer, swap it for the solo neck design with 5 additional solo frets.
tribal_spec_5: Easy navigation: Two integrated analog sticks, an ergonomic D-pad on the headstock, and an eight-button navigation center for easy in-game menu navigation.
tribal_spec_6: Never miss a note: Enjoy connectivity flexibility with wired (USB cable), low-latency fast-polling wireless (2.4GHz dongle), or Bluetooth and tilt functionality for Star Power activation. Comes with a shoulder strap and a 2.5m USB-C cable with a locking mechanism for secure connections.

about_intro: At RIFF, we are passionate about music and video games. Our store was born to bring Guitar Hero, Rock Band, and rhythm game players the best controllers and accessories on the market. We carefully select original, high-quality products so you can enjoy the best musical experience on your console or PC.

drumkit_rb_ps: Rock Band Wired Drum Kit Set Stand for PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 2
drumkit_rb_ps_feature_1: Full drum kit with professional design
drumkit_rb_ps_feature_4: Full compatibility with PlayStation 2 and PlayStation 3
drumkit_rb_ps_desc_1: Experience the real band feeling with a drum kit designed by Harmonix for Rock Band. Includes responsive drum pads and a kick pedal that faithfully reproduce the feel of playing a real drum set, letting you perform fast rhythms, fills, and rolls with precision.
drumkit_rb_ps_desc_2: Thanks to its direct wired connection to the console, the kit offers immediate response with no lag or interference, ideal for intense gaming sessions where every millisecond counts.
drumkit_rb_ps_desc_3: The sturdy stand keeps the drum kit stable even during the most demanding songs. Its adjustable height and angle make it suitable for kids, teens, or adults, providing comfort and ergonomic playing posture.
drumkit_rb_ps_desc_4: Specifically designed for Rock Band and other music games on PS2 and PS3, this drum kit connects easily and is ready to use without complicated setup.
drumkit_rb_ps_desc_5: Each pad is calibrated to detect soft or hard hits, allowing greater expressiveness when playing and better scoring on songs with complex rhythms.
